table.name: posts
table.structure: ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` text NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `url` text NOT NULL, `timecreated` text NOT NULL, `author` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

table.name: themes
table.structure: ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` text NOT NULL, `path` text NOT NULL, `timecreated` text NOT NULL, `status` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
